attacked: You dare attack the King of Heroes?
declaringWar: The gods have decreed your destruction!
introduction: I am Gilgamesh, King of Uruk. What brings you to my lands?
name: Sumer
startIntroPart1: Hail, King Gilgamesh of Uruk! Two-thirds god and one-third man, you are the mighty builder of walls and the seeker of immortality. The Sumerian people, the first to gift the world with writing, law, and irrigation, look to you for protection against the floods and the barbarians.
startIntroPart2: Great King, will you lead your people to glory once more? Will your epic deeds be remembered forever? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?

attacked: We shall fight to the last stone!
declaringWar: You have trespassed on the land of the eagles!
introduction: I am Skanderbeg. Do you come as friend or foe?
name: League of Lezhë
startIntroPart1: Gjergj Kastrioti Skanderbeg, Dragon of Albania! You stood as the shield of Christendom against the Ottoman tide for twenty-five years. From your fortress in Krujë, you united the Albanian princes under the League of Lezhë and defied an empire.
startIntroPart2: Lord Skanderbeg, the eagle calls for you again. Will you raise your banner and defend your people? Will your mountains echo with the songs of freedom once more?
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus

attacked: To arms, citizens! Defend the Republic!
declaringWar: You threaten the peace of Tuscany!
introduction: Welcome to Florence. May you find inspiration in our fair city.
name: Florence
startIntroPart1: Lorenzo Il Magnifico! Banker, diplomat, politician, and patron of scholars, artists, and poets. Under your stewardship, Florence has become the jewel of the Renaissance, a beacon of art and culture that shines across Europe.
startIntroPart2: The glory of Florence is in your hands, Magnifico. Will you continue to foster the arts and fill your city with wonders, or will the machinations of your rivals bring about your downfall?
uniques: [+1 Gold] from every specialist [in all cities]

attacked: You threaten the jewel of the Mediterranean!
declaringWar: The time for diplomacy has passed. Now, the cannons shall speak!
introduction: I am Charles III, King of Naples and Sicily. Welcome to our resplendent court.
name: Kingdom of Naples
startIntroPart1: Great King Charles III, enlightened monarch of the Kingdom of Naples! You revitalized your realm, initiating a golden age of construction and cultural prestige. From the majestic Palace of Caserta to the grand Teatro di San Carlo, your legacy is written in stone and song.
startIntroPart2: The people look to you to guide them to grandeur once more. Will your kingdom become a beacon of culture and power in the Mediterranean? Will your new empire shine through the ages of history?
uniques: [+20]% Production when constructing [Cultural] buildings [in all cities]
